verbs.description: PYONGYANG , North Korea ( FOX NEWS ) -- North Korea [V: has] scheduled a “ ceremony ” to dismantle its nuclear on May 23 - 25 ahead of President Donald Trump ’s summit with leader Kim Jong Un next month , state media said Saturday .
